experience.title: Junior MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Working on MERN Stack for like a 1.5 years and developed pretty much fullstack application for local clients. Worked collaborately with clients and implemented best practices.

experience.title: WAMP
experience.description: Developed an ecommerce for local clients. Maintained the project for a year.

project.title: Solar Scape
project.description: Developed a Solar potential assessment app using MERN stack and Google Earth Engine. Connected Solar database from NREL.

project.title: MIS
project.description: Developed an MIS system for electronic business. Used React for the frontend, Node.js for the backend and for demand forecasting setup a Flask server using apriori algorithm

footer: Built puerly in React and Tailwind CSS. Deployed with Vercel
